title: Change minimum deposit amount to 10 rupees

requirements.summary: Update the minimum deposit amount displayed and enforced in the ManualDepositModal frontend component to ₹10
acceptanceCriteria: The deposit amount input enforces a minimum value of 10.
Submitting an amount below ₹10 shows a validation error: 'Minimum deposit amount is ₹10'.
The modal UI clearly indicates that the minimum deposit is ₹10.

file_operations.description: Update the minimum deposit amount validation from its current value to 10. Change the input field's min attribute to 10, update the client-side validation logic to reject amounts below 10, and modify the error message to state 'Minimum deposit amount is ₹10'. Ensure the UI clearly displays the minimum deposit requirement of ₹10 to users.
